item.title: Mortal Kombat 2 CinemaCon Footage Highlights Karl Urban As "Johnny F***ing Cage"
item.description: Karl Urban's Johnny Cage is the highlight of Mortal Kombat 2's CinemaCon footage, which teases the iconic character ahead of the sequel's release.

item.title: Netflix's Once Upon A Time In Hollywood Sequel Means We Are Getting Quentin Tarantino's Scrapped 10th Movie After All
item.description: Quentin Tarantino's Once Upon a Time in Hollywood is getting a sequel on Netflix, and it looks to be the same movie he previously scrapped.

item.title: This Incredible Star Wars Minecraft Recreates Coruscant, Spanning 36 Million Blocks & Over 800 Blocks Tall
item.description: This breathtaking recreation of Coruscant, one of Star Wars' most important planets, in Minecraft will genuinely catch you by surprise.

item.title: WWE Legend Mick Foley Says He's Hospitalized After Horrific Car Accident
item.description: WWE legend Mick Foley says he suffered a minor concussion in a terrifying car accident on Tuesday ... admitting he has "no idea how I am still walking...
